03 : About Me

About Me

As a computer science student at FAST Islamabad, I've spent most of my time in front of a computer. I am deeply interested in API development and related technologies, with a strong focus on low-level programming and back-end development.

I've been coding for a while now and love to work on tech projects. I have developed my blogs and other personal projects, as well as worked as a web developer for REX MEDIA GROUP.

One of my favorite projects is a web scraper written in Python that scrapes and downloads movies from YTS.io.

Skillset

  • Proficient in low-level programming languages such as C & Assembly for system-level programming.
  • Strong skills in back-end operations, including database management, server configuration, and API development.
  • Familiarity with Python for web development, data analysis, and automation.
  • Experience in managing and customizing blog content using platforms like WordPress and Blogger.
  • Active contribution to open-source projects on GitHub, collaborating with fellow developers to showcase coding projects.
